name: KISS Twitter Wrapper
author: Iain Maitland

sections.description: A simple (no, honestly, it’s stupidly simple) WordPress wrapper plugin for the Twitter Widgets Configurator (https://twitter.com/settings/widgets/new/user/).
sections.installation:
1. Upload kiss-twitter-wrapper.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Navigate to ‘Appearance’ -> ‘Widget’ in WordPress and drag the widget on to your sidebar
  4. Follow the instructions and copy and paste the generated code from the Twitter Widgets Configurator in to the code field and click save. That’s it – you’re done!

short_description: A simple (no, honestly, it's stupidly simple) WordPress wrapper plugin for the Twitter Widgets Configurator (https://twitter.
description: A simple (no, honestly, it’s stupidly simple) WordPress wrapper plugin for the Twitter Widgets Configurator (https://twitter.com/settings/widgets/new/user/).

screenshots.caption: It only takes one line to start using the widget - just copy and paste the generate code from the Twitter widget configurator page and paste it in to the code field.
The Twitter Widgets Configurator page shows how easy it is to set up your timeline feed.
